alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 10:50PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockingham, Strafford, Hillsborough, southern Belknap and southeastern Merrimack Counties through 1130 PM EST... At 1049 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Franklin to Hopkinton to near Henniker to Greenfield to near Royalston. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Concord, Derry, Rochester, Durham, Exeter, Franklin, Henniker, Merrimack, Salem, Northwood, Bedford, Milford, Hooksett, Amherst, Barrington, Litchfield, Hollis and Farmington. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 89 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough
